page.title: Home
page.content:
Are you managing one of the 1 in 3 websites powered by WordPress? If so, you stand to gain quite a bit by learning how the Jamstack can benefit everyone involved with your website, from the content creators to the developers to the people visiting your site.

This website is powered by WordPress, and it’s being used to show the migration process for putting a WordPress site’s frontend on the Jamstack using Gatsby and WPGraphQL.
